channel.title: Related? (Family)
channel.description:
Alright, every time I think about relatives past the typical grandpa and grandma I end up getting extremely confused, so I was wondering if anyone can make sense of this.
There is a girl in my class and I want to possibly begin to form a relationship with her, but I think we are related... :|
I asked her how we were related and she said this:
"My grandma's grandpa and your grandpa are first cousins."
First off, it would be possible for them to be first cousins, correct? If so, would that make her my 4th cousin or something else? I've asked around several places but no luck. Thanks for any help.

Wolfram|Alpha: Making the world’s knowledge computable

Wolfram|Alpha brings expert-level knowledge and capabilities to the broadest possible range of people—spanning all professions and education levels.

edit: fucking love wolfram
[/quote]wut, am I reading that wrong or does it show them as quite a few generations different[/quote]
yeah, but its entirely possible, read what jme said above

item.title: Related? (Family)
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I think after the second cousin mark the incest tree breaks and you’re free to date.

For what its worth, Palin and Obama are 10th cousins.

Read full topic

item.title: Related? (Family)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Chassy13:

It’s safe to say I am more concerned on what other people would think (Family members, her in particular, etc.)

Me personally, I would find it a little bit weird, but I’m not sure why. If I was in that situation I’d probably force myself to forget about her as there’s plenty more girls out there that you haven’t met yet!

I don’t think anyone would judge you too harshly. But it would make it’s way into people’s conversations etc.

This seems like an unlikely relation, but I suppose it’s possible because some people have kids really young, others when they are older.
Girl is 17 years old.
Girl is born when her mom is 18.
Girl’s mom is born when girls grandma is 18.
Girls grandma is born when great grandma is 15.
Girl’s great grandma is born when great great grandpa is 16

If this were true, that makes her great great grandpa only 84 years old!

Read full topic

item.title: Related? (Family)
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Hey, just move to the UK if it ever gets serious.

You can marry your first-cousin here :>

item.title: Related? (Family)
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I think so too. You are much further away than second cousins and I think as long as you are further than that you can get married.

In Wisconsin it’s 3rd or lower. (checked some old notes from a history class that covered marriage, haha)

It’s safe to say I am more concerned on what other people would think (Family members, her in particular, etc.) I’m still interested in knowing how we are related though, but I can’t draw a family tree and relations always seem to be confusing to think about.

Read full topic

item.title: Related? (Family)

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Newty:

It’s far enough away for it not to matter anyways, don’t worry about it lol.

I think so too. You are much further away than second cousins and I think as long as you are further than that you can get married.

Read full topic

item.title: Related? (Family)
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

I drew a family tree and it shows that you and her grandmother are third cousins. What the fuck?

Read full topic

item.title: Related? (Family)
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

“My grandma’s grandpa and your grandpa are first cousins.”

|----------------------------Her Grandma’s Mom’s Dad (Great-great grandpa)
| |
| Her Grandma’s Mom (Great grandma)
| |
My grandpa Her Grandma
| |
Mom Mom
| |
Me Her

That’s what I get from thinking about it. It doesn’t look to me like my grandpa can be first cousins with her great-great grandpa. Although like I said, I am fucking retarded with this kind of stuff.

Newty:

It’s far enough away for it not to matter anyways, don’t worry about it lol.

I know it’s far down the line and personally I see nothing wrong with it at the distance, but I have no idea what she would think about it.

Read full topic

item.description:
